content: As an AI language model, I don't have personal preferences or opinions, but based on reviews and feedback from visitors, some of the most popular shops include Melbournalia for its unique and stylish Melbourne-themed souvenirs, The Aboriginal Cultural Gifts for its authentic Aboriginal art and cultural products, and The National Gallery of Victoria Design Store for its design-focused souvenirs. However, all of these shops offer something unique and worth checking out, so it really depends on what type of souvenirs you're interested in purchasing.
